Key Match Events: Alperen Şengün delivered an impressive performance with 25 points, 18 rebounds, 5 assists, 4 steals and 1 block over 34 minutes of play
Miscellaneous Highlights: LaMelo Ball scored 34 points and had 11 assists for the Hornets
Jalen Green netted 28 points for the Rockets
Others: Adem Bona, a rising star from Türkiye and a recent draft pick, made his NBA debut for the 76ers, scoring 2 points and 1 rebound in limited playing time
